M

MainActivity - Class in cc.valyriansteelers.news.adapter_and_activity
The main activity page where all the news articles from different sources are shown in a recycler view arranged in a way convenient for the user to read.
MainActivity() - Constructor for class cc.valyriansteelers.news.adapter_and_activity.MainActivity
 
modify(Article, int) - Static method in class cc.valyriansteelers.news.article_object.NewsStore
Used for modification of index corresponding article
modifyadapter(Article, Integer) - Method in class cc.valyriansteelers.news.adapter_and_activity.HomeNewsAdapter
This function notifies the view that a particular article at a specified index has been changed which are passed as arguments
